code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import TaskForm from'./TaskForm';import{axiosReq}from'../api/axiosDefaults';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EditTask=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[task,setTask]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchTask=async()=>{try{const response=await axiosReq.get(`/api/tasks/${id}/`);setTask(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching task:',error);}};fetchTask();},[id]);if(!task)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TaskForm,{initialTask:task});};export default EditTask;
